channel.title: WHERE DO YOU LEARN HOW TO CODE A SERVER? (or how)
channel.description: I would like to know where do I learn to code a server (like write my own client file and stuff like that). Post here or email at abrammazal@hotmail.com . If you tell me well THANKS ALOT! And ill help others when i know how. :)
